name: Tales of the Uncursed Kingdom Solitaire
name_original: Tales of the Uncursed Kingdom Solitaire
description:
Once upon a time 235 brave knights came together and united a shattered kingdom. Together their leaders formed the Round Table to rule the kingdom in unity. After restoring the strength of the country they began the task of lifting its curse. During their adventures they recovered the missing grails and healed the sacred trees. Thus the Tales of the Uncursed Kingdom began.
Will you become one of its heroes?

Check out the Kickstarter Campaign for the real physical cards here:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/blueboxinteractive/tales-of-the-uncursed-ki...

A small Solitaire game using our custom card design made for actual playing cards.  Originally created as a reward for backers during the Pixel Kingdom Kickstarter Campaign, now available for everyone. This version is updated with improved card handling and an option to switch between the old Pixel Kingdom design and the new Tales of the Uncursed Kingdom style.

No official mobile support but it might just work for you regardless.
